item.title: Microservices Deployment on AKS with GitOps
item.description: null Blog Post Introduction # Deploying multiple microservices to Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) using Azure DevOps for CI/CD and ArgoCD for GitOps-based continuous deployment.
